about_the_game:
The Case of the Golden Idol Original Soundtrack delivers the base game soundtrack heard in-game.

Full of suspense and mystery, these tracks are scored to keep you on the edge of your seat as you piece the evidence together to unmask the awful truth behind the dark conspiracy.

This soundtrack contains 13 base game tracks in 256kbps MP3 and 1411kbps WAV
Composed by Kyle Misko.
